report.title: Get my squares
report.description: Get a list of squares that have been assigned to the user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples locationSamples on locationSamples.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false WHERE l.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id# OR l.location_type_id=#additional_square_location_type_id# AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.

param.name: pss_mode
param.display: Is the page running on the NPMS (PSS) system rather than splash.

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

column.name: name
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null AND #pss_mode#=0 then '' || l.centroid_sref || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') || '' when l.parent_id is null AND #pss_mode#=1 then '' || l.centroid_sref || '' end
